title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 102.1 - General information
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 102.1 - General information

State Regulations
A bank, trust company, safe deposit company,[FN*]
investment company* or mutual trust investment company* proposing to amend its
organization certificate pursuant to Banking Law, Article XV, should submit a
letter application to the superintendent and stating the reasons
therefor. [FN*] Reference is made to Tax Law, section 180, regarding
the tax imposed on such institutions for increases in capital
stock. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
102.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
